                <!-- DFP PREFIX CONFIGURATION -->
<script type="text/javascript">
    window.dfpPrefix = "";
    window.dfpPrefixController = {};
    (function(){
        var slotPrefix = "8900/24.com/Web/HuffingtonPost";
				var slotPrefixOverride = "";

        
            
        

        
            
                //For SA
                
                    slotPrefix = slotPrefix + "/homepage";
                

                
                
                slotPrefix = slotPrefix + "/";

            
        
        
        
            
        
        

        var results = new RegExp('[\?&]dfp_test_prefix=([^&#]*)').exec(window.location.href);
        if (results && results[1]){
            window.dfpPrefix = results[1].trim().replace(/^\/+|\/+$/g, '');
        } else {
            slotPrefix = slotPrefixOverride || slotPrefix;
            window.dfpPrefix = slotPrefix;
        }
    })();
</script>

<script>
window.waitForGlobal = function(identifier, cb, poll) {
  var test = typeof identifier === "function" ? identifier : function() { return !!window[identifier]; };
  var interval;
  if(test()) {
    cb();
  } else {
    interval = setInterval(function(){
      if(test()) {
        cb();
        clearInterval(interval);
      }
    }, poll || 50);
  }
};

window.modulousQueue = (function() {
  var queue = [];
  var run = false;
  function runner(fn) {
    setTimeout(function(){
      try {
        fn();
      } catch (e) {
      }
    }, 0);
  }
  return {
     add: function(fn) {
       var _tmp1 = !run && queue.push(fn);
       var _tmp2 = run && runner(fn);
     },
     runAll: function() {
       var i = 0;
       run = true;
       for(;i<queue.length;i++) {
         runner(queue[i]);
       }
       queue = [];
     }
  };
}());

setTimeout(function(){
  waitForGlobal('jQuery', modulousQueue.runAll);
}, 5000);
</script>
<script>
var _HPJS = (function (_mod) {
  "use strict";

  _mod.loadJS = function (src, options) {
    var options = options || {};
    var ref = window.document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
    var script = window.document.createElement("script");
    script.src = src;
    script.async = options.async;
    script.defer = options.defer;
    ref.parentNode.insertBefore(script, ref);
    return script;
  }

  _mod.loadJSLater = function (url, timeout) {
    var ran = false;
    var loader = function () {
      if (ran) {
        return;
      }
      ran = true;
      _mod.loadJS(url, {async:true});
    }
    window.addEventListener ?
      window.addEventListener("load",loader,false) :
      window.attachEvent && window.attachEvent("onload",loader);
    // in case the load event never fires
    setTimeout(loader, timeout || 15000);
  }

  _mod.waitForGlobal = function(identifier, cb, poll) {
    var test = typeof identifier === "function" ? identifier : function() { return !!window[identifier]; };
    var interval;
    if(test()) {
      cb();
    } else {
      interval = setInterval(function(){
        if(test()) {
          cb();
          clearInterval(interval);
        }
      }, poll || 50);
    }
  };

  return _mod;

}(_HPJS || {}));
</script>

            s.onreadystatechange = beaconLoaded;

        function bN_ready(callback) {
            if (!window.bN_ready.listeners) {
                callback(window.bN);
            } else {
                window.bN_ready.listeners.push(callback);
            }
        }

        function beaconLoaded() {
            window.bN_ready.listeners.forEach(function(callback) {
                callback(window.bN);
            });

            window.bN_ready.listeners = null;
        }
    })(document);
</script>

<div id="dfp_Top_1x1" class="dfp clearfix ad-top_1x1">
<script type="text/javascript">
    var cX = cX || {};
    cX.callQueue = cX.callQueue || [];
    (function(){
        var dfp_placement_slug = 'top_1x1';
        var dfp_slot_id = 'Top_1x1';
        var dfp_div_id = "dfp_" + dfp_slot_id;
        var dfp_div_el = document.getElementById(dfp_div_id);
        var dfp_prefix = window.dfpPrefix || "";
        dfp_prefix = dfp_prefix + dfp_slot_id;

        

        var display_in_template = false;
        

        dfpController.console.log("[DFP slot \u25C9] " + dfp_placement_slug + " -> " + dfp_prefix, "color: #2196f3;");
        cX.callQueue.push(['invoke', function() {
            googletag.cmd.push(function(){
                var dfp_slot = 
                  googletag.defineOutOfPageSlot(dfp_prefix, dfp_div_id)
                    .addService(googletag.pubads())
                    .setTargeting("CxSegments", cX.getUserSegmentIds({persistedQueryId: '6108e7e5ee629759870206096a1d3949eca98b12'}));
                  

                dfpController.registerSlot(dfp_div_id, {
                    slot: dfp_slot,
                    selector: dfp_div_el,
                    placement: dfp_placement_slug
                });

                if(display_in_template){
                    dfpController.displaySlot(dfp_div_id);
                }

                dfpController.attachAdReloadEvent(dfp_div_el, dfp_slot);
                return;
            });
        }]);
        return;
    })();
    </script>
</div>

<div id="ad_leaderboard_flex" class="ad_wrapper_"><!-- TEMPLATE CODE -->
<div id="dfp_leaderboard_flex" class="dfp clearfix ad-leaderboard_flex">
<script type="text/javascript">
    var cX = cX || {};
    cX.callQueue = cX.callQueue || [];
    (function(){
        var dfp_placement_slug = 'leaderboard_flex';
        var dfp_slot_id = 'leaderboard_flex';
        var dfp_div_id = "dfp_" + dfp_slot_id;
        var dfp_div_el = document.getElementById(dfp_div_id);
        var dfp_prefix = window.dfpPrefix || "";
        dfp_prefix = dfp_prefix + dfp_slot_id;

        

        var display_in_template = false;
        

        dfpController.console.log("[DFP slot \u25C9] " + dfp_placement_slug + " -> " + dfp_prefix, "color: #2196f3;");
        cX.callQueue.push(['invoke', function() {
            googletag.cmd.push(function(){
                var dfp_slot = 
                  googletag.defineSlot(dfp_prefix, dfpController.getSizeByPlacement(dfp_placement_slug), dfp_div_id)
                  .setTargeting(dfp_placement_slug)
                  .addService(googletag.pubads())
                  .setTargeting("CxSegments", cX.getUserSegmentIds({persistedQueryId: '6108e7e5ee629759870206096a1d3949eca98b12'}));
                  

                dfpController.registerSlot(dfp_div_id, {
                    slot: dfp_slot,
                    selector: dfp_div_el,
                    placement: dfp_placement_slug
                });

                if(display_in_template){
                    dfpController.displaySlot(dfp_div_id);
                }

                dfpController.attachAdReloadEvent(dfp_div_el, dfp_slot);
                return;
            });
        }]);
        return;
    })();
    </script>
</div>

}</script>

                <div class="card__content">
                    
                                                                                        <a class="card__image card__link bN " href="/mbulelo-nguta/all-south-africans-must-be-steadfast-in-their-condemnation-of-racism_a_23228490/?utm_hp_ref=za-homepage" target="_self" data-beacon='{"p":{"plid":"23228490","mvt":"apage_card_23cxjfvdwg00000000000000:A"}}'>
                            <span class="card__image__wrapper ">
                                <img src="https://o.aolcdn.com/images/dims3/GLOB/crop/847x484+2+11/resize/250x140!/format/jpg/quality/85/http%3A%2F%2Fo.aolcdn.com%2Fhss%2Fstorage%2Fmidas%2F607f7c3cdeafd865ae2e7c43cc9f4d34%2F205730202%2FMicah-Cosatu.jpg" alt="" class="card__image__src">

                                                            </span>
                        </a> <!-- /.card__image -->
                                                             <ul class="card__headlines">
                                                    <li class="card__entry">
                                        
    <h3 class="card__headline">
        <a class="card__link bN" href="/mbulelo-nguta/all-south-africans-must-be-steadfast-in-their-condemnation-of-racism_a_23228490/?utm_hp_ref=za-homepage" target="_self" data-beacon='{"p":{"plid":"23228490","mvt":"apage_card_23cxjfvdwg00000000000000:A"}}'>All South Africans Must Be Steadfast In Their Condemnation Of Racism</a>
    </h3>

                        <div class="author-card">
                <i class="author-card__headshot" style="background-image: url(http://o.aolcdn.com/images/dims?thumbnail=100%2C100&amp;image_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fs.blogcdn.com%2Fwww.huffingtonpost.co.za%2Fmedia%2F2017%2F01%2Fmbulelongunta.jpg&amp;client=cbc79c14efcebee57402&amp;signature=a84c2980060fec29f082858261db72a7fe084650);"></i>

                <div class="author-card__details">

                <div class="card__content">
                    
                                                                                        <a class="card__image card__link bN " href="/jacomien-de-klerk/the-face-of-agriculture-is-predominantly-male-this-needs-to-change_a_23223232/?utm_hp_ref=za-homepage" target="_self" data-beacon='{"p":{"plid":"23223232","mvt":"apage_card_bzuszesu9s00000000000000:A"}}'>
                            <span class="card__image__wrapper ">
                                <img src="https://o.aolcdn.com/images/dims3/GLOB/crop/6913x3948+0+501/resize/250x140!/format/jpg/quality/85/http%3A%2F%2Fo.aolcdn.com%2Fhss%2Fstorage%2Fmidas%2F36dcafaf095980c7aa5613657b43c4eb%2F205449173%2Fafrican-woman-laughing-picture-id538889138" alt="" class="card__image__src">

                                                            </span>
                        </a> <!-- /.card__image -->
                                                             <ul class="card__headlines">
                                                    <li class="card__entry">
                                        
    <h3 class="card__headline">
        <a class="card__link bN" href="/jacomien-de-klerk/the-face-of-agriculture-is-predominantly-male-this-needs-to-change_a_23223232/?utm_hp_ref=za-homepage" target="_self" data-beacon='{"p":{"plid":"23223232","mvt":"apage_card_bzuszesu9s00000000000000:A"}}'>The Face Of Agriculture Is Predominantly Male -- This Needs To Change</a>
    </h3>

                        <div class="author-card">
                <i class="author-card__headshot" style="background-image: url(http://o.aolcdn.com/images/dims?thumbnail=100%2C100&amp;image_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fs.blogcdn.com%2Fwww.huffingtonpost.co.za%2Fmedia%2F2017%2F09%2Fjacomien.jpg&amp;client=cbc79c14efcebee57402&amp;signature=f14b3546c96e605941fe6ff9e8386f4736bb9932);"></i>

                <div class="author-card__details">
                                        <a data-beacon='{"p":{"lnid":"author"}}' href="/author/jacomien-de-klerk/" class="author-card__details__link" target="_self" >
                        <span class="author-card__details__name">
                            Jacomien De Klerk
                        </span>
                    </a>

                    <span class="author-card__microbio">
                        General Manager of the Citrus Academy
                    </span>
                </div>
            </div>
            

                            </li>
                                            </ul> <!-- /.card__headlines -->
                                    </div> <!-- /.card__content -->
            </div> <!-- /.card--apage -->

                        </a> <!-- /.card__image -->

                        <div class="author-card">
                <i class="author-card__headshot" style="background-image: url(http://o.aolcdn.com/images/dims?thumbnail=100%2C100&amp;image_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fs.blogcdn.com%2Fwww.huffingtonpost.ca%2Fmedia%2F2017%2F09%2Fcoepmquk400x400.jpeg&amp;client=cbc79c14efcebee57402&amp;signature=80b2e96b1f375c10642c7bcded32eb57aa2912bc);"></i>

                                                             <ul class="card__headlines">
                                                    <li class="card__entry">
                                        
    <h3 class="card__headline">
        <a class="card__link bN" href="/maurits-zwankhuizen/can-dennis-rodman-get-trump-and-kim-jong-un-to-play-ball_a_23224145/?utm_hp_ref=za-homepage" target="_self" data-beacon='{"p":{"plid":"23224145","mvt":"apage_card_c2fpmc1fwmthtxznagd4hs00:A"}}'>Can Dennis Rodman Get Trump And Kim Jong-un To Play Ball?</a>
    </h3>

                        <div class="author-card">
                <i class="author-card__headshot" style="background-image: url(http://o.aolcdn.com/images/dims?thumbnail=100%2C100&amp;image_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fs.blogcdn.com%2Fwww.huffingtonpost.com.au%2Fmedia%2F2016%2F08%2Fmzbw.jpg&amp;client=cbc79c14efcebee57402&amp;signature=1b3ced1aa3886c52253adcc1239f10f5e51e335c);"></i>

                <div class="author-card__details">
                                        <a data-beacon='{"p":{"lnid":"author"}}' href="/author/maurits-zwankhuizen/" class="author-card__details__link" target="_self" >
                        <span class="author-card__details__name">
                            Maurits Zwankhuizen

                                                             <ul class="card__headlines">
                                                    <li class="card__entry">
                                        
    <h3 class="card__headline">
        <a class="card__link bN" href="/mbulelo-nguta/saa-will-soon-be-rewarded-with-r10-billion-for-mismanagement-and-failure_a_23213419/?utm_hp_ref=za-homepage" target="_self" data-beacon='{"p":{"plid":"23213419","mvt":"apage_card_uk7mdiy4e800000000000000:A"}}'>SAA Will Soon Be Rewarded With R10 Billion For Mismanagement And Failure</a>
    </h3>

                        <div class="author-card">
                <i class="author-card__headshot" style="background-image: url(http://o.aolcdn.com/images/dims?thumbnail=100%2C100&amp;image_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fs.blogcdn.com%2Fwww.huffingtonpost.co.za%2Fmedia%2F2017%2F01%2Fmbulelongunta.jpg&amp;client=cbc79c14efcebee57402&amp;signature=a84c2980060fec29f082858261db72a7fe084650);"></i>

                <div class="author-card__details">
                                        <a data-beacon='{"p":{"lnid":"author"}}' href="/author/mbulelo-nguta/" class="author-card__details__link" target="_self" >
                        <span class="author-card__details__name">
                            Mbulelo Nguta
                        </span>
                    </a>

                    <span class="author-card__microbio">
                        Director of School Vouchers SA
                    </span>
                </div>
            </div>
            

                            </li>
                                            </ul> <!-- /.card__headlines -->

                                                             <ul class="card__headlines">
                                                    <li class="card__entry">
                                        
    <h3 class="card__headline">
        <a class="card__link bN" href="/lesetja-kganyago/heres-what-the-role-of-the-sarb-should-be-from-the-mouth-of-its-boss_a_23210232/?utm_hp_ref=za-homepage" target="_self" data-beacon='{"p":{"plid":"23210232","mvt":"apage_card_yicpb4kc1s00000000000000:A"}}'>Here&#039;s What The Role Of The SARB Should Be, From The Mouth Of Its Boss</a>
    </h3>

                        <div class="author-card">
                <i class="author-card__headshot" style="background-image: url(http://o.aolcdn.com/images/dims?thumbnail=100%2C100&amp;image_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fs.blogcdn.com%2Fwww.huffingtonpost.co.za%2Fmedia%2F2017%2F06%2Flesetja.jpg&amp;client=cbc79c14efcebee57402&amp;signature=71dfed4b1a243befe228314ea618e661307b540b);"></i>

                <div class="author-card__details">
                                        <a data-beacon='{"p":{"lnid":"author"}}' href="/author/lesetja-kganyago/" class="author-card__details__link" target="_self" >
                        <span class="author-card__details__name">
                            Lesetja Kganyago
                        </span>
                    </a>

                    <span class="author-card__microbio">
                        Governor of the South African Reserve Bank
                    </span>
                </div>
            </div>
            

                            </li>
                                            </ul> <!-- /.card__headlines -->
                                    </div> <!-- /.card__content -->
            </div> <!-- /.card--apage -->

<div id="modulous_right_rail_flex" class="ad_spot desktop-only">
    <script type="text/javascript">
  if ( "function" === typeof(adSetSyncDelay) ) {
    adSetSyncDelay('125');
  }
</script>
<div id="ad_right_rail_flex" class="ad_wrapper_top"><!-- TEMPLATE CODE -->
<div id="dfp_RR_Flex" class="dfp clearfix ad-right_rail_flex">
<script type="text/javascript">
    var cX = cX || {};
    cX.callQueue = cX.callQueue || [];
    (function(){
        var dfp_placement_slug = 'right_rail_flex';
        var dfp_slot_id = 'RR_Flex';
        var dfp_div_id = "dfp_" + dfp_slot_id;
        var dfp_div_el = document.getElementById(dfp_div_id);
        var dfp_prefix = window.dfpPrefix || "";
        dfp_prefix = dfp_prefix + dfp_slot_id;

        

        var display_in_template = false;
        

        dfpController.console.log("[DFP slot \u25C9] " + dfp_placement_slug + " -> " + dfp_prefix, "color: #2196f3;");
        cX.callQueue.push(['invoke', function() {
            googletag.cmd.push(function(){
                var dfp_slot = 
                  googletag.defineSlot(dfp_prefix, dfpController.getSizeByPlacement(dfp_placement_slug), dfp_div_id)
                  .setTargeting(dfp_placement_slug)
                  .addService(googletag.pubads())
                  .setTargeting("CxSegments", cX.getUserSegmentIds({persistedQueryId: '6108e7e5ee629759870206096a1d3949eca98b12'}));
                  

                dfpController.registerSlot(dfp_div_id, {
                    slot: dfp_slot,
                    selector: dfp_div_el,
                    placement: dfp_placement_slug
                });

                if(display_in_template){
                    dfpController.displaySlot(dfp_div_id);
                }

                dfpController.attachAdReloadEvent(dfp_div_el, dfp_slot);
                return;
            });
        }]);
        return;
    })();
    </script>
</div>
<!-- TEMPLATE CODE ENDS --></div>

    var cX = cX || {};
    cX.callQueue = cX.callQueue || [];
    (function(){
        var dfp_placement_slug = 'right_rail_lower';
        var dfp_slot_id = 'RR_Lower1';
        var dfp_div_id = "dfp_" + dfp_slot_id;

                  googletag.defineSlot(dfp_prefix, dfpController.getSizeByPlacement(dfp_placement_slug), dfp_div_id)
                  .setTargeting(dfp_placement_slug)
                  .addService(googletag.pubads())
                  .setTargeting("CxSegments", cX.getUserSegmentIds({persistedQueryId: '6108e7e5ee629759870206096a1d3949eca98b12'}));

                    selector: dfp_div_el,

<script type="text/javascript">
    var cX = cX || {};

    (function(){
        var dfp_placement_slug = 'right_rail_300x250_lower';
        var dfp_slot_id = 'RR_Lower2';
        var dfp_div_id = "dfp_" + dfp_slot_id;
        var dfp_div_el = document.getElementById(dfp_div_id);
        var dfp_prefix = window.dfpPrefix || "";
        dfp_prefix = dfp_prefix + dfp_slot_id;

        

        var display_in_template = false;
        

        dfpController.console.log("[DFP slot \u25C9] " + dfp_placement_slug + " -> " + dfp_prefix, "color: #2196f3;");
        cX.callQueue.push(['invoke', function() {
            googletag.cmd.push(function(){
                var dfp_slot = 
                  googletag.defineSlot(dfp_prefix, dfpController.getSizeByPlacement(dfp_placement_slug), dfp_div_id)
                  .setTargeting(dfp_placement_slug)
                  .addService(googletag.pubads())
                  .setTargeting("CxSegments", cX.getUserSegmentIds({persistedQueryId: '6108e7e5ee629759870206096a1d3949eca98b12'}));
                  

                dfpController.registerSlot(dfp_div_id, {
                    slot: dfp_slot,
                    selector: dfp_div_el,
                    placement: dfp_placement_slug
                });

                if(display_in_template){
                    dfpController.displaySlot(dfp_div_id);
                }

                dfpController.attachAdReloadEvent(dfp_div_el, dfp_slot);
                return;
            });
        }]);
        return;
    })();
    </script>
</div>
<!-- TEMPLATE CODE ENDS --></div>
</div>
                                                                                                            </div>
                                                    </div>
                                    </div>
            </div>
        </div>

                    <div class="desktop-only">

<script src="http://www.blogsmithmedia.com/www.huffingtonpost.co.za/assets-hf2dd48e8d68d1ee3a0d86e349c49f59c/js/vendor.min.js?h=9957c2dc0ceac3156afac2746473cb60"></script>
<script src="http://www.blogsmithmedia.com/www.huffingtonpost.co.za/assets-hf2dd48e8d68d1ee3a0d86e349c49f59c/js/scripts.min.js?h=535f559621a9d303656db118c086a370"></script>



    <script type="text/javascript">
                $(document).ready(function () {
            var plids = [], mvts = [];

            $('.bN').each(function () {
                var beaconData = $(this).attr('data-beacon');

                if (beaconData) {
                    try {
                        beaconData = JSON.parse(beaconData);

                        if (beaconData.p && beaconData.p.plid && beaconData.p.mvt) {
                            plids.push(beaconData.p.plid);
                            mvts.push(beaconData.p.mvt);
                        }
                    } catch (e) {
                        // Some beacons fail due to invalid syntax. A failing beacon parse might break twitter embeds.
                        console.error('Invalid beacon data', beaconData, 'data for', this);
                    }
                }
            });

            if (mvts.length > 0) {
                bN_ready(function (bN) {
                    bN.set('plids', plids.join(';'), true);
                    bN.set('mvts', mvts.join(';'), true);
                    bN.ping('mlt');
                });
            }
        });
    </script>

        
                            

        
        
    </body>
</html>
